title: On Top Gun: Maverick, She-Hulk, and the Fear of Liking Things
content: Tom Cruise’s return to the cockpit is getting raves. Meanwhile, Tatiana Maslany’s turn as a green superhero looks like an unnecessary Ally McBeal reboot. What is happening?
